items.sentence: Let\'s have a farewell party for Tom tomorrow.
I don\'t think Tom knows I\'m Mary\'s brother.
Who\'s the most important person in your life?
Why didn\'t you tell Tom the truth right then?
Most people think that they\'re above average.
He reached across the table and shook my hand.
He said that he would come back here tomorrow.
We have to drive back home to Boston tomorrow.
Tom doesn\'t feel up to eating anything today.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary is as pretty as Alice.
I remember when we used to fight all the time.
I saw Tom and Mary playing a game of dominoes.
Tom didn\'t want to make a big deal out of it.
Isn\'t there something you want to say to Tom?
It took Tom a long time to find Mary\'s house.
It was clear that Tom didn\'t want to help us.
I didn\'t know Tom was in Australia last year.
I hadn\'t considered not going to the meeting.
Tom might\'ve been the one who told Mary that.
Have you been having problems with your email?
